medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient felt a lump in the upper outer quadrant of her left breast 8 months earlier. A diagnostic mammogram revealed two nodular densities. A follow-up ultrasonographic examination and a core needle biopsy confirmed invasive ductal carcinoma shortly before the current evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had never taken oral contraceptives or other hormones, was nulliparous, and had been exposed to diethylstilbestrol in utero. A vaginal biopsy 23 years earlier showed adenosis with no evidence of cancer. She has no other medical illnesses.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is living with a partner, drinks fewer than five alcoholic beverages per week, and is a nonsmoker.
